Detailed Description

This class lets you receive midi events through virtual ports (where possible) or connect to midi senders and receive midi data from them.

Bindings info:
lib_name:'Out_core' string_format:'%s (%f)' string_args:'(*userdata)->portName(), (*userdata)->port()'

Definition at line 128 of file Out.h.

int midi::Out::port_id_ [private]

Midi port id to which the element is connected. If the value is -1 this means it has opened its own virtual port.
